title: OPL round 1 tipping results!
body:
Thursday Feb 5th 
**42** Summoners picked Thursdays games correct!
http://i.imgur.com/FzUfu2m.png

Monday Feb 9th 
**4** Summoners picked Mondays games correct!
http://i.imgur.com/7yxZ9MJ.png

Unfortunately this week no one managed to guess all 8 games correctly. But there is always next week. Use all the standings and all the information you have learned in round one and head on over to make your round two picks!

Round two tipping post - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports/jM8ehbpm-oceanic-pro-league-round-2-tipping-who-are-you-backing
